name: internxt-sync
description: A tool to synchronize and upload files to Internxt Drive

scripts.build: bun build internxt-sync.ts --outdir src --target node --external chalk || node scripts/cross-platform-build.js
scripts.test: bun test src/test || echo 'Tests require Bun to run. Please install Bun: https://bun.sh/docs/installation'
scripts.test:watch: bun test --watch src/test || echo 'Tests require Bun to run. Please install Bun: https://bun.sh/docs/installation'
scripts.test:coverage: bun test --coverage src/test || echo 'Tests require Bun to run. Please install Bun: https://bun.sh/docs/installation'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build

author: ngarate
